title: Inside Europe 12.05.2022
description: Breaking down the psychology of Russian propaganda, testing the depths of Swiss disaster planning, unpacking Northern Ireland's historic election results. Also: challenges to the EU’s ban on Russian oil imports, a conversation with the podcaster giving voice to the Russia-German community and the Berlin Philharmonic’s Karajan Academy turns 50.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Kate Laycock, Eamonn McCann, Maxim Ayukov, Ira Peters, Russlanddeutsche, Sinn Fein, Northern Ireland, Inside Europe
